question: 1. How much of a neat freak are you?
answer1: Cleaning my home is my passion, an obsession. If only I had a vacuum cleaner for my vacuum cleaner!
answer2: No coasters in my house, I need to live in a world where people can spill!

question: 2. How are your home-making skills?
answer1: I can't make dinner even by following a recipe book!
answer2: My place is the home base for my friends, if I can't host Thanksgiving, no one can!

question: 3. How competitive are you?
answer1: I will take a day off work just so I can play ball with you till I win, I better not lose or I will freak out!
answer2: I don't care just as long as I'm having fun!

question: 4. Do you like bossing around?
answer1: I'm never preachy, I simply want to do my own thing and have fun!
answer2: I have to be in charge! My controlling ways are tough to deal with at times!

question: 5. Do you have everything planed out?
answer1: My towels are organized into 11 groups. Everything is labeled in my home and I got my wedding planned out at 6th grade!
answer2: Today I work as a masseuse, tomorrow I might play the guitar in a caffe!
